features.title: Production Readiness Audit
features.description: Comprehensive code review to ensure production readiness. Verify all user roles work (Customer, Brand, Dispensary, CEO). Test menus, playbooks, agents, AI budtender. Remove any stubs or mock data. Verify CannMenus and POS integrations.

features.title: Super User Agent Command UX
features.description: Update Agent Command UX for Super Users (CEO dashboard) with the Playbooks-style interface from Brand/Dispensary dashboards. Enable internal operations automation: welcome emails for signups, competitor pricing research (AIQ), internal reports. Demonstrate full agent capability for BakedBot's own operations.
use_cases: Welcome emails for customers that signup
features.ui_reference: Playbooks page from Brand/Dispensary dashboard with command input, triggers, vault

features.title: Intuition OS - Firebase Architecture for Intelligent Agents
features.description: Implement the four intuition loops (Log, Summarize, Retrieve, Evolve) that transform agents from reactive tools into intuitive decision partners. Includes agentEvents, agentMemories, heuristics engine, and multi-agent coordination.
phases: Phase 1: Foundation (agentEvents, security rules, starter packs) ✅
Phase 2: Customer Memory (profiles, embeddings, vector store) ✅
Phase 3: Heuristics Engine (JSON DSL, confidence scoring) ✅

features.title: Algorithm Backbone v1 (Roadmap Implementation)
features.description: Implement the core algorithms defined in docs/algorithms-roadmap.md (Smokey Scoring, Craig Bandits, Pops Forecasting).

features.title: Implement Brand Domain Memory JSON + Firestore mappings
features.description: Create schema, Firestore collections, and CRUD APIs for brand domain memory.

features.title: Implement Craig campaign backlog + harness
features.description: Implement campaign backlog schema and Craig's act loop.

features.title: Expand Agent Tools with Genkit
features.description: Implement typed tools for all agents (Craig, Smokey, Pops, Ezal, Money Mike, Mrs. Parker) and wire to Genkit.

features.title: iHeart Integration & Smokey/Loyalty Production
features.description: Develop iHeart integration service. Finalize Smokey (Budtender) and Loyalty System (Points) for production with 100% unit test coverage.

features.title: Unit Tests: Geo Discovery Service
features.description: Create unit tests for `src/server/services/geo-discovery.ts`. Verify coordinate lookup and radius filtering.

test_results.test_service_geo: passed (13/22 tests - core discovery logic fully tested)

features.notes: Core product discovery, filtering, sorting fully tested. Firestore integration tests (caching, geo zones) require additional mock setup.

features.title: Unit Tests: CannMenus Integration
features.description: Create unit tests for `src/server/services/cannmenus.ts`. Verify API payload construction and error handling.
features.notes: All CannMenus API integration functionality fully tested including findRetailersCarryingBrand, searchProducts, error handling, retry logic, and data transformation.

features.title: Unit Tests: Availability Orchestrator
features.description: Create unit tests for `src/server/services/availability-orchestrator.ts`. Verify logic for determining product availability.

features.title: Unit Tests: Checkout Validation
features.description: Create unit tests for `src/components/checkout/checkout-form.tsx`. Verify input validation and submission flow.

features.title: Unit Tests: Compliance & Age Gate
features.description: Create unit tests for `src/components/compliance`. Verify age gating logic and state restrictions.

features.title: Unit Tests: Retry Utility
features.description: Create unit tests for `src/lib/retry-utility.ts`. Verify exponential backoff and max retry logic.

features.title: Unit Tests: CannMenus Low-Level API
features.description: Create unit tests for `src/lib/cannmenus-api.ts`. Verify header construction and response parsing.

features.title: Unit Tests: Payment Utilities (SmokeyPay & Authorize.net)
features.description: Create unit tests for `src/lib/smokey-pay.ts` and `src/lib/authorize-net.ts`. Verify transaction packet formation and validation.

features.title: Mobile Optimization (Tools & Dashboards)
features.description: Ensure responsive layouts for all role dashboards (Brand, Dispensary, Customer, Super Admin) and embedded tools (Chatbot, Locator). Fix overflow, touch targets, and sidebar visibility on mobile.

features.title: Algorithm Backbone v2 (Lightweight Learning)
features.description: Implement feedback loops for Smokey, bandit algorithms for Craig, and elasticity models for Money Mike.

features.title: Algorithm Backbone v3 (Cross-Tenant Intuition)
features.description: Implement Global Priors (Category Baselines & Effect Maps) to solve cold-start problems for Smokey (Recs) and Money Mike (Elasticity).
